name: onFingerDetected & onFingerRemoved can be fired during the whole measurement sequence
testSteps:
Remove finger from camera in any step of the measurement process

*condition:*  fingerDetectionExpiryTime is not altered (default = -1)
Put finger back on the camera
expectedResult: onFingerDetected and onFingerRemoved are fired at the correct time
parentNames: Active listeners during the whole lifecycle
